# UILargeContentViewerItem

**Protocol**

Methods that provide details about how to display your custom content in the large content viewer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UILargeContentViewerItem : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Integrating with the large content viewer

- **showsLargeContentViewer**: A Boolean value that indicates whether or not to show the item in the large content viewer.

## Configuring display properties

- **largeContentTitle**: A string that describes an item to display in the large content viewer.
- **largeContentImage**: An image that represents an item to display in the large content viewer.
- **largeContentImageInsets**: Insets to adjust the position of the item’s image so it appears visually centered in the large content viewer.
- **scalesLargeContentImage**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view scales the item’s image to a larger size or not.

## Content viewer

- **UILargeContentViewerInteraction**: An interaction that enables a gesture to present the large content viewer for cases when supporting the largest dynamic type sizes isn’t appropriate.
- **UILargeContentViewerInteractionDelegate**: An object that customizes the behavior of the large content viewer interactions.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
